test_cases.test_case_description: Verify advertiser registration with valid details

test_steps.action: Enter valid business name, email, phone number

test_cases.expected_results: Registration successful, OTP verification screen displayed

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify OTP verification for advertiser registration

test_steps.action: Enter received OTP in verification screen

test_cases.expected_results: OTP verified successfully, account activated

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify advertiser login with valid credentials
preconditions: Advertiser account exists and is verified
test_cases.expected_results: Login successful, redirected to dashboard

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify password reset functionality

test_steps.action: Follow reset link and enter new password

test_cases.expected_results: Password reset successful, can login with new password

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify advertiser can view profile information
test_cases.expected_results: Profile information displayed correctly

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify advertiser can update profile information

test_steps.action: Update business name and contact details

test_cases.expected_results: Profile updated successfully, changes reflected

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify advertiser can view wallet balance
test_cases.expected_results: Current wallet balance displayed accurately

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify advertiser can view transaction history
test_cases.expected_results: Transaction history displayed with dates, amounts, and descriptions

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify wallet recharge using JAZZ CASH
test_cases.expected_results: Wallet recharged successfully, balance updated

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify wallet recharge using vouchers
test_cases.expected_results: Voucher applied successfully, wallet balance updated

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify advertiser can create advertising campaign
test_cases.expected_results: Campaign created successfully, status shows as pending

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify campaign parameter specification

test_steps.action: In campaign creation form, specify target location

test_cases.expected_results: All campaign parameters accepted and validated

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify advertiser can view active campaigns
test_cases.expected_results: Active campaigns displayed with current status and details

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify advertiser can track driver locations
test_cases.expected_results: Map displays real-time locations of drivers displaying advertisement

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify driver registration

test_steps.action: Enter driver details and vehicle information

test_cases.expected_results: Driver registered successfully

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify driver login
test_cases.expected_results: Driver logged in successfully

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify driver receives campaign requests
test_cases.expected_results: Campaign request notification received with campaign details

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify driver can accept campaign requests
test_cases.expected_results: Campaign accepted, driver assigned to campaign

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify driver can navigate to installation center
test_cases.expected_results: GPS navigation provided to nearest installation center

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify driver can upload verification images

test_steps.action: Take photo of advertisement on car

test_cases.expected_results: Verification image uploaded with location data

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify admin login to web portal
test_cases.expected_results: Admin logged in successfully, redirected to dashboard

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify admin password reset
test_cases.expected_results: Admin password reset successfully

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify admin can add new admin accounts
preconditions: Admin logged in with user management privileges
test_cases.expected_results: New admin account created successfully with specified permissions

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify admin can add drivers to system
test_cases.expected_results: Driver added to system successfully

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify admin can block driver accounts
test_cases.expected_results: Driver account blocked successfully, driver cannot login

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify admin can send notifications to users
test_cases.expected_results: Notification sent successfully to selected users

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify JAZZ CASH payment integration
test_cases.expected_results: Payment processed successfully via JAZZ CASH gateway

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify driver earnings calculation
test_cases.expected_results: Driver earnings calculated correctly based on campaign parameters

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify discount coupon application
test_cases.expected_results: Coupon applied successfully, discount reflected in final amount

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify real-time driver location tracking
test_cases.expected_results: Driver location tracked and updated in real-time every 30 seconds

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify campaign display on map
test_cases.expected_results: Active campaigns displayed on map with driver locations

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify route deviation detection
test_cases.expected_results: System detects and flags route deviations

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify customer support ticket submission
test_cases.expected_results: Support ticket submitted successfully with unique ticket ID

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify FCM push notifications
test_cases.expected_results: Push notification delivered within 5 seconds

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify secure password hashing

test_steps.action: Verify password is hashed, not plaintext

test_cases.expected_results: Password stored as secure hash, not plaintext

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify TLS encryption for API communications

test_steps.action: Monitor network traffic during API calls

test_cases.expected_results: All API communications encrypted using TLS

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify session timeout mechanism
test_cases.expected_results: Session expires after 30 minutes of inactivity, user redirected to login

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify rate limiting for brute force protection

test_steps.action: Verify account lockout or rate limiting

test_cases.expected_results: Account locked or rate limited after multiple failed attempts

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify mobile application load time

test_steps.action: Measure time to fully loaded state
Verify load time is within 3 seconds

test_cases.expected_results: Application loads within 3 seconds on minimum spec devices

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify system supports 1000 concurrent users

test_steps.action: Configure load testing tool for 1000 users
Verify system stability and response times

test_cases.expected_results: System handles 1000 concurrent users without performance degradation

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify API response time under normal load

test_steps.action: Send API requests under normal load

test_cases.expected_results: API responses delivered within 2 seconds under normal load

assumptions: JAZZ CASH sandbox environment available for payment testing
Google Maps API key configured for location services testing
Firebase FCM configured for push notification testing
AWS infrastructure accessible for integration testing
Test devices with varying Android versions available
Load testing tools available for performance validation
Network monitoring tools available for security testing
Database access available for backend validation
Installation centers available for physical testing
Test vehicles available for end-to-end campaign testing
Valid test data including users, campaigns, and transactions
Email server configuration for notification testing
SSL certificates configured for HTTPS testing
Rate limiting thresholds configured in system
Session timeout configured to 30 minutes
Minimum wallet balance rules configured
Campaign pricing algorithms implemented
Driver verification workflow implemented
Advertisement compliance rules defined
Data retention policies implemented
Backup and recovery procedures established
Audit logging mechanisms implemented
